website_summaries.verdict: The Adalene wall clock has one hand in the decorative world and one in the functional timekeeping world. We like its clean, modern lines, but we also appreciate its old school design.
pros: Exceptionally quiet operation, with a non-ticking second hand
True wooden frame, not a plastic reproduction
Off-white clock face is not shockingly bright, but still easy to read
cons: Clock mechanism may drain batteries quickly and not maintain accurate time
Priced closer to a decorative wall clock than a utilitarian kitchen model

customer_reviews.title: Great and beautifull wall clock
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are really very excited and very happy with this wall clock!!! First off all, the shipping, it arrived just a few days after we ordered it, the packaging was perfect it was wrapped in bubble wrap....it showed us that this a very reputable company...And the clock, we hung it in our country home in the kitchen and it matches beautifully with the cabinets and draws a perfect match.... it is a very classy and fine timepiece the wooden beige frame is really pretty and also the dial that off white color with those large numbers even my mom in her nineties can see those numbers !!!! we recommend this item.....
customer_reviews.author: E. Breuer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase and would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the clock for a couple of days (and I was prompted to write a review), but so far, it looks nice and keeps time well. It looks just like the picture. For those who ask, there is a soft ticking sound in a quiet room (it's in my office and I'm seated only a couple of feet away from it), but I don't find it annoying. If I'm a few feet away in the living room (no wall between the office and living room), I don't hear it. I'm happy with my purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Gia

customer_reviews.title: We’re happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with the purchase of this clock. We have a great room 26’ x 22’ and we placed it on the wall above the doorway into the adjoining laundry room. It’s attractive. The numbers are large enough for me to see from around the room and adjacent rooms. It’s quiet. We’re happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ao

customer_reviews.title: Great looking clock for the eclectic decorator
customer_reviews.text: Great looking clock for the eclectic decorator. Fits well onto any wall when space is limited but high visibility is required. I'm nearly 100% blind, but I can see this clock without being in the same room with it. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Donald J.

customer_reviews.title: Clock
customer_reviews.text: Awesome clock, sweep second hand, no tick sound, very quiet.

customer_reviews.title: Clock is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This clock is beautiful! I wanted something simple but classy and this clock did it. It is the right size for my area, the wood is beautiful and the face is easy to read. It was packaged well and arrived in excellent condition. It even arrived earlier than stated when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: love elephants

customer_reviews.title: A good clock for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the reviews of this clock where they said they couldn't tell if the [surround] was real wood or plastic... it's wood. the clock is easy to read, and so far (one month)is keeping great time. Not a huge investment either, well worth the money, or at least mine was.
customer_reviews.author: William R. MacIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Might try a different product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this clock but it kept stopping for no reason. Took the battery out and did that 3 times. Now it seems to be running fine. I don’t like to take the time to return things so I didn’t but would have if it was more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jackman

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Clock
customer_reviews.text: A very nice clock. A decorative piece with a real wood frame. The slightly mottled face and silent, sweep hand gives it a very elegant feeling.

customer_reviews.title: Nice 14" wall clock!
customer_reviews.text: Great clock so far - it looks exactly like the photo - measures 14" across - keeps accurate time - you can hear a very tiny tick tick tick when everything else is silent (so not over the general hummmm of the refrigerator etc.).

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love the size
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love the size, look, value and quality of this wall clock. I purchased id for one of my mangers office and they loved it.

customer_reviews.text: So far so good - several months and keeps accurate time and looks great. Wish it was a little larger.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful clock

I bought it to replace a digital clock with a readout that was very hard to see from a distance. Price might be a little high for a basic wall clock but I am very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed.; Second review: Does not keep time accurately. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Works well in the place I wanted it. So far it is working well. Simple design, but practical. Large enough to see well in big room. Addition to reiew: I am now disappointed in this clock. It does not keep accurate time. It gains time very fast, and I have to adjust the time every couple of days. Not good! For this reason, I will no longer recommend this clock. Love the look but not the function. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: bluebonnet

customer_reviews.title: Great clock
customer_reviews.text: This clock is what I'd call expensive! However, after putting a battery in it, I can see why. The second hand in cheap clocks moves second by second and if you have good hearing, can hear it "click" at each second. This clock is quiet as stated by seller and the second hand does not jump from second to second. It moves around at a steady speed. At first my wife was freaked out by the movement of the second hand probably because she's never had a "good" clock! (oh, yea - she's a Blonde)
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: I found this beautiful clock on Amazon and purchased it because it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes sleep on my sofa and my old clock would keep me awake. I found this beautiful clock on Amazon and purchased it because it is silent. The quality of this clock is better than I thought it would be. So nice in fact that when I was shopping for a watch, I went with a Bulova. Quality with a reasonable price. Very satisfied with this clock.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quiet clock

customer_reviews.title: Very nice elegant wall clock
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock, it looks very elegant and its large size is easy for my old eyes to see from across the room. A bit pricey but in this case at least you get what you pay for. I kind of miss the ticking of my old clock but I have to admit I'm enjoying the quiet for a change.

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I really love the clock
customer_reviews.text: The clock came to our door in 2 days. My wife and I really love the clock. Silent, accurate, easy to read from 20 yards and very attractive. We are extremely pleased.

Unfortunately I will be returning it.

It doesn’t look like a $50 clock and it acts like a piece of garbage. I will not be purchasing from this company again.

product_meta.title: Adalene Wall Clocks Large Decorative for Living Room - 14 Inch Analog Quartz Wood Wall Clocks Battery Operated Decorative - Vintage Round Beige Dial Modern Wood Wall Clock
feature_bullets: Solid wood frame exudes an attractive sheen enhancing the sophistication of its inherent grain pattern and simple natural beauty, 13.8 inch diameter, 2 inch depth
Dial features a beige design, Black metal hands, Black Arabic numerals, Easy to read, Plastic back
Seconds hand, Battery operated quartz movement (requires 1 AA battery - not included)
Perfect clock for hanging outdoor or indoor dining rooms, living rooms, family rooms, bedrooms, study room, kitchen, office, or conference room
Decorative clock blends in with many different furnitures, color walls, or decorative wall paintings

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars196 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
